participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Determined and motivated, Alex thrives on challenges and loves to inspire others.
participant_1.background: i love running and preparing for marathons. i am a clean eater. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. my parents were both very athletic.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Friendly and approachable, Jordan enjoys connecting with others and sharing experiences.
participant_2.background: i live in alabama. i like tacos. i've three sisters. i've one brother. i love dogs.

content.text: What was the first job of the job?
